UserProfile.title: UserProfile
UserProfile.description: Represents a user profile within the application, allowing multiple profiles per user.

avatar.description: URL or identifier for the profile's avatar image.

isLocked.description: Whether the profile is locked with a PIN.

favoriteGenreId.description: The ID of the user's favorite genre.

country.description: The user's country for regional content.

MyListItem.title: MyListItem
MyListItem.description: Represents a movie or show in a user's 'My List'.

mediaId.description: The TMDB ID of the movie or TV show.

addedAt.description: The timestamp when the item was added.

WatchHistoryItem.title: WatchHistoryItem
WatchHistoryItem.description: Stores the user's watching progress for a particular movie or episode.

mediaId.description: The TMDB ID of the movie or TV show.

progress.description: The user's saved progress in seconds.

duration.description: The total duration of the media in seconds.

watchedAt.description: The timestamp when the item was last watched.

/users/{userId}/profiles/{profileId}.description: Stores user profiles. Each user can have multiple.

/users/{userId}/profiles/{profileId}/myL.description: The user's personal watchlist for a specific profile.

/users/{userId}/profiles/{profileId}/his.description: The user's watch history for a specific profile.
